content: my first ever granny stitch pattern this project is fast and easy and was designed to make the most out of your cakes of self-striping yarn though it will work equally well with most yarns the granny stitch includes a turn in the middle to break up the striping and adds motion and interest and the lightly scalloped border is built into the row work this one as an infinity scarf or a cowl or something in between the pattern is extremely easy to adjust if you d like to make yours wider or narrower visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 2 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 3 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 4 visiting polly s place on ravelry 5 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 6 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 7 1 http //wp me/p6otoq-nx 2 everytrickonthehook com 3 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 4 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 5 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 6 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 7 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
